slide1.subtitle: Moments of joy with sharing and giving
slide1.label: Special Sharing

slide2.title: A special day where warm hearts gather
slide2.subtitle: Happiness together, time of sharing

introduction.title: Creating new cultural sharing
introduction.subtitle: We are
introduction.name: Sasaek-ui-hyanggi
introduction.description: Sasaek-ui-hyanggi is a non-profit organization that strives to contribute to society through 'happy cultural sharing' and to create an advanced and healthy social culture as a community of literary people.

president.title: Message from the Chairman
president.greeting: Hello, I am Oh Deok-gyun, the chairman of Sasaek-ui-hyanggi.
president.message1: Sasaek-ui-hyanggi has been working to create a better society through 'happy cultural sharing'.
president.message2: We will continue to share the value of literature and humanities and grow together as an open community.
president.closing: Thank you for your interest and support.

1.title: Humanities Concert
1.description: A time of deep contemplation and warm conversation, stories of literature and humanities that touch the heart

2.title: Local Festival
2.description: A day of laughter together while feeling the breath of the region, warmth growing in simple meetings

3.title: Sharing Bazaar
3.description: Items that convey happiness, and the stories within them

4.title: Warm Sponsorship
4.description: Small sharing becomes a big resonance, creating a better tomorrow with Sasaek-ui-hyanggi

donation.title: If you want to send warm hearts through donation,

app.title: Efforts to create a better world.
app.description1: We are trying to create a community that transcends generations and countries through activities that elevate proper character and personality and share together.
app.description2: We welcome everyone who needs small talk and wisdom of life.
app.description3: We provide small help to those who have difficulties in life. If you have problems that are difficult to solve legally or personally, please ask SoDam Supporters for help.
app.release: Community APP 'Small Talk APP' to be released in June 2025

1.name: Happy People Inc.
1.description: We provide special days with happy people on happy days.

2.name: Good Comment Alliance
2.description: Creating a beautiful society through the establishment of good comments.

3.name: Artrian
3.description: A permanent art gallery project proposing a new paradigm for the living art market.

4.name: Korea WeMen Committee
4.description: Great mentors for children, WeMen is with you.
